titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Minna Crooks Young papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Papers of Mrs. Clifford C. Young of Portland, Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Correspondence with, and clippings and other materials about medical writer, Paul DeKruif, including manuscript, 1921, entitled, "Our Medicine Men"; also article by DeKruif about C. C. Young.
